BBEX3.M.AMD.USD.CA.AC.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Armenia / USD 1 = AMD ... (middle)
General: With effect from 22 November 1993, the Armenian dram was introduced as legal tender at the rate of 200 rouble = 1 dram. Since 1 March 1994, the dram has been the sole legal tender.
Source: Central Bank of Armenia, Yerevan (from January 2001 to September 2006 calculated on the basis of buying and selling rates).
Comment on 2009-03: Exchange rate floated as from 3 March 2009.
